name: Metropolitan (Daemonn)
description:
You are a gold coin.

You are the capital.

You are to help the fancy and sensual Manhatten found what it has lost.

But it can never found something it lost long ago.

Use left mouse button to control.

Designer: Stain

Designer: Joestar Zhao

Programmer: Daemon Pan

Artist: Constanza Tong

source code: https://github.com/pyh0884/FindingHappiness
